column2: "What's this shaking?"
"An earthquake? No, not quite... It's almost as if something within the ground is stirring..."
"Something within the ground? Zeno, what do you mean?"
"Basically, he means that this place is dangerous."
"Who said that?"
"Sorry to surprise you."
"And you can relax, I'm just an ordinary ARKS member, like you."
"If you're an ordinary ARKS member, then what does that make us?"
"You're Casra, one of the three heroes of the Council of Six."
"The Council? You mean the highest rank?"
"If you know who I am, then that makes things easier to explain."
"As a higher ranking member of the ARKS, I recommend that you retreat immediately."
"...but I guess I'm one to talk, given that I'm heading this way on my own."
"As long as you're here, would you mind accompanying me?"
"Agree."
"Are you sure we won't just get in the way?"
"Refuse."
"Understandable. Given that a member of the Council is involved, you have no idea what you might be dealing with."
"No worries. Besides, investigating is more my style, so it would be reassuring to have some backup."
"Don't mind me. Just think of me as an ordinary ARKS member."
"Furthermore, there are a number of things I'd like to explain along the way."
"Sounds like we don't have time to stand around and talk, then. Let's go."
"I appreciate it."
"Come on, everyone, let's go!"
